permissions: User must have access to the customer via Customer policy scope; non-admin users are limited to customers within their policy scope.
validation_notes: Filters accept comma-separated IDs for customer and default-assignee. kind filter must be a valid incident kind.

flags.name: --customer
flags.description: Filter by customer ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --default-assignee
flags.description: Filter by default assignee user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --kind
flags.validation: One of: equipment, plant, trucking, crew, safety, quality, weather, traffic, capacity, job_site_condition, planning, near_miss, property_damage, personal_injury, over_trucking, good_catch, damage, overloading, subcontractor_delay, mobilization, accident_notification_and_assistance, theft, vandalism, vehicle_incident, work_zone_intrusion.
